nodes.oneHundredTitle: Powerful and capable. Our most popular package and perfect for private events.
nodes.twoHundredTitle: 3D complexity. Designed for large branded activations and guaranteed to amaze your audience.

children.text: Firefly also offers full and partial custom drone light shows.
Custom shows are an incredible tool for brands, and any of our stock shows can be partially customized around your event.
If youâ€™d like to learn more about our full custom process from design to production, click the link below for a recent case study.
Our most popular package. Perfect for small events with an audience of up to a thousand people, or venues with space constraints.
With formations stretching up to 500ft across, this package delivers a powerful display at a budget friendly level.
A great option for creating beautiful 2D imagery, simple logos, and shorter words up to 10 characters in length.
A massive, breathtaking display guaranteed to amaze your audience. Ideal for medium-high levels of design detail, 3D shapes and complex logos or icons.
This higher quantity of drones provides the ultimate creative flexibility and design capabilities.
Experiential storytelling has never been more effective.
The ultimate drone light show, specifically designed for massive branded experiences and events with large audiences.
With an unprecedented level of intricacy and resolution, this is the future of entertainment and advertising.
This activation will live beyond the event, and make waves through digital media.
